name: Sen and the Puppetmaster
description:
Sen and their friends have been traveling the world on a quest to fulfill their destiny to stop a great darkness and looming destruction. Last night, as the group settled in to rest, a magical force spirited away all your party members to the depths of a nearby dungeon. Now, you're in the final room, surely containing the boss of this dungeon. Defeat him, Save your friends, and Continue on your epic, world-saving adventure! But beware adventurer, the Puppetmaster doth cling tight to his prizes, and he cannot be defeated 'till he has no more puppets to control.

WASD - Move
Spacebar - Swing sword

Game built for educational purposes, I do not own the rights to any music used, nor will I make profit from their use, and I will gladly take down the game on request.
Player character assets and title screen music by Ansimuz
Tile map assets by Cainos
Boss fight music is Master of Puppets (instrumental) by Metallica
